Text:
dette hadde vært jævlig interresant,om det hadde vært sub,på ett scandinavisk språk.
dette er en meget bra serie.
du har gjort bra jobb,men det mangler subs.
maiko

Looks like a brilliant miniseries.  Are there any minor spoken parts in another language (perhaps German) that would require English subtitles for me to understand?

I downloaded "A Bridge Too Far" once only to find that even though it's an English language film, some parts are in German and without subtitles, I couldn't follow it.

Thanks
mongodlx Feel free to make one if you're missing it...

Tror ni verkligen på de här skräckhistorierna eller låssas ni för att va häftiga?

please put a version in english and spanish, please!!!, and put all history!!, please
99,9%!!! Trötta mig! Va i helv...e gör jag nu då? Annars tack cdomeij.
